meanings.definition: A tool used to remove pencil marks.
meanings.sent1: I always keep erasers in my pencil case.
meanings.sent2: She used the erasers to fix her drawing.
meanings.sent3: The erasers on his pencils were worn down from constant use.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted like erasers, wiping away any bad feelings.
meanings.sent5: The erasers left a clean, white page behind.

meanings.definition: The act of removing mistakes or errors.
meanings.sent1: Using erasers helps me correct my spelling mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He made many erasers while editing his essay.
meanings.sent3: The erasers of time slowly erased the memories of that day.
meanings.sent4: Her apologies were like erasers, wiping away any misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The erasers of forgiveness can heal old wounds.
